basics.name: Reza Babaei
basics.label: Senior Fullstack Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Fullstack Engineer with 8+ years building external-facing web tooling and scalable platforms across frontend, backend, and cloud infrastructure. Expert in React, TypeScript, Next.js, Node.js, and GraphQL with proven results in performance optimization, real-time event systems, offline-first sync, and distributed architecture. Delivered systems serving 100M+ users. Experienced with AWS, Azure, Docker, serverless, and CI/CD pipelines. Based in Ankara, open to relocation to Amsterdam.

highlights: Co-leading mission-critical mobile and backend platform used in global field operations
Used in global field operations under low-connectivity and mission-critical conditions
Designed offline-first sync architecture with SQLite and background workers to support near real-time monitoring workflows in unreliable networks
Migrated critical crypto and validation logic to native modules, reducing latency from ~3s to <500ms
Architected containerized Azure + Docker environments and deployment pipelines
Built automated testing stack (unit, integration, E2E) with Jest, Detox, and Maestro in CI
Reduced bundle size ~40% and load time ~25% through dependency and architecture optimization
First in-house engineer owning frontend, mobile, and serverless backend for 50k+ user platform
Built customer-facing web tooling in Next.js (React/TypeScript), integrating with serverless APIs
Led AWS serverless migration (Lambda, API Gateway), reducing infra cost ~50% and latency ~35%
Built custom tile server and caching layers for high-concurrency map workloads
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and automated deployment flows
Improved memory usage ~40% and load time ~25% through profiling and refactoring
Developed TypeScript SDK and client platform serving 100M+ monthly active users
Implemented caching, reactive state, and real-time event layers across web and mobile for live data monitoring
Architected GraphQL schemas to improve API consistency and reduce partner integration effort ~60%
Built automated unit and integration testing strategy
Architected high-availability platforms with sub-second API latency
Optimized backend infrastructure using Redis caching and query optimization
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment friction and improving release velocity
Led team of 5 engineers building video streaming platform serving 10k+ daily users
Built e-commerce and marketing websites using Next.js/React and Laravel backends
Implemented microfrontend architecture to scale large web surfaces and enable modular feature delivery
Optimized backend APIs and caching, reducing latency from ~800ms to ~200ms
Implemented Docker-based CI/CD and production deployment workflows
